article: bush administration criticism of house speaker nancy pelosi 's trip to syria this week is `` hypocritical beyond belief , '' california rep. tom lantos said friday as he and the speaker prepared to return home from their nine-day trip with a congressional delegation to the mideast .
abstract: lantos lashes out at critics of pelosi trip
